ModMetaData.name: Rim Holstaur
ModMetaData.author: Sullos
ModMetaData.description: Rim-Holstaur adds a new xenotype and faction focused on Holstaurs. Holstaurs are monster girls known for their laid back lives, delicious milk, and need to find a husband. The Holstaur tribe, is non-violent, rarely attacking humans. Should you find a holstaur, any colony would be very happy with their kind and loving nature they bring with them. This mod will work best with Biotech, RJW, and Sized Apparel. Gene adding mods such as RJW Genes, Alpha Genes, and Integrated Genes will add additional functionality and a more accurate representation of how Holstaurs are intended to be. Credit for the original Bikini textures goes to TeH_Dav and Argon.
